entity_type.description: The namespace and ID of the entity type that will be spawned.
entity_type.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the entity type that will be spawned.

tag.description: If specified, this NBT data will be applied to the entity that will be spawned.
tag.markdownDescription: If specified, this NBT data will be applied to the entity that will be spawned.

entity_action.description: If specified, the specified entity action type will be executed on the entity that will be spawned when it is spawned.
entity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified entity action type will be executed on the entity that will be spawned when it is spawned.

bientity_action.description: If specified, this bi-entity action will be executed on either or both the actor (the entity that invoked the entity action) and the target (the spawned entity).
bientity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this bi-entity action will be executed on either or both the actor (the entity that invoked the entity action) and the target (the spawned entity).
